data.message: Detroit... it's full of best rapper's i must to admit this thing... i know cuz you Eminem don't give a sheat about my comment but you have all the reasons... you are the rap GOD :) all youre creations... so much dedication... work... and performance... you are blessed.... if you read this comment... i ask you just one more think... :) with your'e own word... :) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1wYNFfgrXTI
